comments.content: [Pepsi](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063245/http:/www.ffonts.net/AF-PEPSI.font) by Abstract Fonts, an unofficial version of some Pepsi lettering and very close to [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063245/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic).
